docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, May 31--The state moved today to halt the use of X-ray and radiation equipment by unlicensed persons.

headline.main: State Bars X-Rays In Chiropractic Use And in Shoe Stores; Effective Outside City STATE PUTS CURB ON USE OF X-RAYS No Useful Purpose

docs.abstract: Comr Hilleboe approves amendment to NYS Sanitary Code barring unlicensed use; chiropractors and shoe stores chiefly affected; NYC weighs revising its Code
docs.snippet: ALBANY, May 31--The state moved today to halt the use of X-ray and radiation equipment by unlicensed persons.
